.
Applying for VALife
Award transactions generate release of VALife eligibility letters to Veterans with potential eligibility anytime the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) grants SC for a new disability.
Veterans aged 80 and under may apply for VALife any time after being granted SC for a condition.  Veterans over age 80 must meet the criteria in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.G.1.a
.
VALife applications can be submitted by the
Veteran
Veteran’s appointed Veterans service organization, agent, or attorney
VA-appointed fiduciary, or
court-appointed guardian.
If the Veteran is mentally incompetent, only the VA-appointed fiduciary or court-appointed guardian may apply for this insurance.
